description: This healthy and hearty red bean kale soup is packed with juicy tomatoes, savory rosemary, and (optionally) seasoned up with a touch of hot sauce.
name: Rosemary Red Bean and Kale Soup
recipeIngredient: 1 14 oz. can red kidney beans, drained
1 tbsp. cayenne pepper sauce, (adjust to your spice preference, or omit entirely if not your thing)

recipeInstructions.text: Coat the bottom of a large saucepan or stock pot with oil and place over medium heat. When oil is hot, add onion and sauté for about five minutes, or until softened.
Add garlic and sauté an additional minute or until fragrant.
Add remaining ingredients, stir until tomato paste is blended in, and heat to a simmer.
Continue simmering about 20 minutes or until kale is tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Ladle into bowls and serve.
